examples: Asian cultures have a rich heritage of art, music, and dance.
The company culture was toxic, with a cutthroat environment and a focus on profits at all costs.
The bear is a symbol of strength and courage in many cultures.
In many cultures, the last name is passed down from the father's side of the family.
Learning a new language opens doors to different cultures and opportunities.
words.defineEn: the general beliefs, customs, and lifestyles of a specific society
words.defineVi: niềm tin, phong tục và lối sống chung của một xã hội cụ thể

examples: Art serves an important function in our society.
Art be damned!
Art is very much a matter of taste.
The born politician's art of working a crowd.
Rugby and art seem strange bedfellows.
words.defineEn: works of art or objects produced in a beautiful way such as paintings, sculptures, etc.
words.defineVi: các tác phẩm nghệ thuật hoặc đồ vật được tạo ra một cách đẹp đẽ như tranh vẽ, tác phẩm điêu khắc, v.v.

examples: Even the experts took the painting for a genuine Van Gogh.
His paintings had a strong influence on me as a student.
Your painting has come out really well.
The old painting depicted a picturesque landscape from a bygone era.
The paintings were damaged beyond recall.
words.defineEn: the act or art of making pictures, using paints
words.defineVi: hành động hoặc nghệ thuật tạo ra hình ảnh, sử dụng sơn

examples: This picture shows my mother as a young woman.
For children, picture books provide a window onto the world.
The board meeting painted a pretty grim picture.
The book paints a vivid picture of life in the city.
I have a picture frame with a family photo on my desk.
words.defineEn: a drawing or painting, etc. of someone or something
words.defineVi: một bản vẽ hoặc bức tranh, v.v. của ai đó hoặc cái gì đó

examples: That bacon sandwich really hit the spot!
A cup of coffee hits the spot at any given time.
A car hit the barrier.
The bus hit the bridge.
The woman hit the mugger with her umbrella.
words.defineEn: something, such as a movie, play, song, etc. that is very popular and successful
words.defineVi: cái gì đó, chẳng hạn như một bộ phim, một vở kịch, một bài hát, v.v... rất nổi tiếng và thành công

examples: Charlotte excels in playing the piano because she learned the instrument at her mother's knee.
The process involves using steam to sterilize the instruments.
The musician stepped up his game and practiced his instrument for hours every day, resulting in a more polished and professional sound.
His consuming passion for music drove him to spend every free moment practicing his instrument.
This instrument also allowed the development of dead reckoning.
words.defineEn: an object or device used for producing music, such as a violin or a piano
words.defineVi: một đối tượng hoặc thiết bị được sử dụng để sản xuất âm nhạc, chẳng hạn như một cây vĩ cầm hoặc một cây đàn piano

examples: The guitarist went AWOL in the middle of the recording.
Bassists and guitarists can compare the fourth harmonic to the third harmonic on the next string up
Its vocalist and guitarist, Dan Auerbach, has also been making a name for himself in recent years in another setting.
I'm here with the lead singer, guitarist, frontman for Sado Opera.
What would you say his strengths are as a rock guitarist?
words.defineEn: someone who plays the guitar
words.defineVi: một người chơi guitar

examples: The best professional musicians start young.
The new student quickly made friends with the other musicians, because birds of a feather flock together.
Musicians can also put their money where their mouths are and play benefit gigs.
The magazine features interviews with musicians and reviews of new albums.
The musician's fingers lightly touched the piano keys, creating a beautiful melody.
words.defineEn: someone who plays a musical instrument or writes music, especially as a profession
words.defineVi: một người chơi nhạc cụ hoặc viết nhạc, đặc biệt là một nghề

examples: Jazz has always been a feast to my ears.
In my opinion, none of the new jazz trumpeters are on a par with Miles Davis.
You actually like modern jazz, do you?
I need some glue, paper, string, and all that jazz to make a kite.
I need to find a stylist to do our hair and makeup and all that jazz on the day of the wedding.
words.defineEn: a music genre that emphasizes improvisation, complex rhythms, and extended chords, originated in the United States in the late 19th and early 20th centuries
words.defineVi: một thể loại âm nhạc nhấn mạnh sự ngẫu hứng, nhịp điệu phức tạp và hợp âm mở rộng, bắt nguồn từ Hoa Kỳ vào cuối thế kỷ 19 và đầu thế kỷ 20

examples: My husband's favorite genre of music is pop.
James nervously popped the question to his girlfriend during a romantic dinner.
Cripps pink apples add a pop of color and a sweet-tart taste to my fruit salad.
I keep my students on their toes with pop quizzes.
Pop is a feast to the ears of many, but I despise it.
words.defineEn: music that is popular, either as a genre with catchy tunes and lyrics or as a selection of the current popular songs from different genres
words.defineVi: nhạc phổ biến, hoặc là thể loại có giai điệu và lời bài hát hấp dẫn hoặc là tuyển tập các bài hát nổi tiếng hiện nay từ các thể loại khác nhau

examples: He now rocks a distinguished look with his silver strands.
Charity hits rock bottom in Emmerdale.
He's got rocks in his head.
Morale within the company was at rock bottom.
The boat rocked gently as we set sail on a sunny day.
words.defineEn: a genre of popular music, with a strong beat played on electric guitars and drums, evolved from rock and roll and pop music
words.defineVi: một thể loại âm nhạc phổ biến, với nhịp điệu mạnh mẽ được chơi trên guitar điện và trống, phát triển từ nhạc rock and roll và nhạc pop

examples: She had broken the world 100 meters record.
His new world record will take some beating.
His time in the 25-meter freestyle set a national record.
The movie broke all box-office records.
The movie broke box office records in the US.
words.defineEn: a round, thin piece of plastic with a hole in the middle, on which music, etc. is recorded
words.defineVi: một miếng nhựa tròn, mỏng có lỗ ở giữa, trên đó ghi nhạc, v.v.

examples: We took a helicopter tour to get a bird's-eye view of the city.
The tour is free, but all meals are at your own expense.
We took a boat tour to explore the beautiful coastline.
They are planning a city tour to discover hidden gems and local attractions.
To go on a journey/tour/trip/cruise.
words.defineEn: a journey made by musicians, sports teams, etc. during which they perform or play in several different places
words.defineVi: một hành trình được thực hiện bởi các nhạc sĩ, đội thể thao, v.v. trong đó họ biểu diễn hoặc chơi ở nhiều nơi khác nhau

examples: That DJ's voice really sets my teeth on edge.

His voice dropped to a whisper.
Those coffin nails are going to hurt your voice.
Her voice broke as she relived the experience.
words.defineEn: the quality of sound or tone of a person
words.defineVi: chất lượng âm thanh hoặc giai điệu của một người

examples: The students worked their heart and soul on their project.
Not working my foot.
Soymilk works well as a substitute for milk in sauces and creamy pasta dishes.
My dad works forty hours a week.
To work clay.
words.defineEn: a painting, piece of music or book that is produced by a painter, musician or writer
words.defineVi: một bức tranh, bản nhạc hoặc cuốn sách được sản xuất bởi một họa sĩ, nhạc sĩ hoặc nhà văn

examples: His favorite band is playing a concert on Friday night.
When does the concert begin?
Tickets for the concert are like gold dust.
The concert went a bomb and the audience loved every minute of it.
We had a good time at the concert last night.
words.defineEn: a public performance by musicians or singers
words.defineVi: một buổi biểu diễn công cộng của nhạc sĩ hoặc ca sĩ

examples: Do you really have a crush on folk dancers?
No, she isn't a good dancer.
Sarah's daughter is an accomplished ballet dancer and has won several awards.
The team's big game halftime show was a dog and pony show with dancers and flashy lights, but it didn't improve the team's performance in the game.
The dancer's performance was so mesmerizing that she left her rivals standing and won the competition with ease.
words.defineEn: someone whose profession is dancing
words.defineVi: một người có nghề nghiệp là khiêu vũ

examples: The teacher drummed the names of the state capitals into our heads.
Chris kills it on drums.
a learning disabled man is on the drums!
but he has a drum.
He has a snare drum.
words.defineEn: a musical instrument consisting of a hollow, round frame with plastic or skin stretched tightly across one or both ends, played by hitting it with sticks or hands
words.defineVi: một nhạc cụ bao gồm một khung tròn, rỗng bằng nhựa hoặc da được căng chặt ở một hoặc cả hai đầu, được chơi bằng cách đánh bằng gậy hoặc tay

examples: This group of artists and poets is sometimes called the New York School.

He's a poet, just like Jim Morrison! -

And poets and emo rockers love them for it.

examples: The superintendent believed Lancaster's story.

The true story inspired many people around the world.
The figures tell a different story.

words.defineVi: một mô tả về các sự kiện và con người có thật hoặc tưởng tượng

examples: The novel follows the fortunes of a village community in Scotland.

words.defineEn: a long written story that usually involves imaginary characters and places

examples: Alice's song hits the airwaves.

examples: Our players kept the pedal to the metal all season long.

The rookie player made his bow on the field during the championship game.

words.defineVi: một người chơi nhạc cụ chuyên nghiệp

examples: Sarah was a gifted painter who had won several awards for her work.

examples: In classical mythology, the griffin has the body of a lion with the head and wings of an eagle.

This is all classical mechanics.

words.defineVi: liên quan đến âm nhạc cổ điển

Opera is his passion, so. -

examples: The music was far too loud for my liking.

examples: Guy sneezed loudly.

words.defineEn: producing a sound or noise with high volume
words.defineVi: tạo ra âm thanh hoặc tiếng ồn với âm lượng lớn

examples: All newspapers sang from the same song sheet.

examples: The manager played his strongest side of the season.

examples: He danced the issue around.

Asian cultures have a rich heritage of art, music, and dance.

words.defineVi: để di chuyển cơ thể âm nhạc trong một cách đặc biệt
